sentences: Stephen Keith Lang (March 24, 1949 – February 4, 2017) was a Canadian musician and bassist best known for his time and work with the Canadian rock band April Wine from 1976 to 1984 during the bands most successful years.
Lang joined April Wine in 1976, replacing then-bassist Jim Clench.
That year he recorded with the band for their fifth studio album The Whole World’s Goin’

Crazy (1976)Lang left April Wine in 1984 and pursued the financial field and former original bassist Jim Clench rejoined after Langs departure and took over bass duties until the band disbanded in 1986.

When April Wine reformed in 1992, for a tour Lang was offered to rejoin the band but ultimately decided not to and stuck with his investment business, Jim Clench was then drafted back into the band, Clench died in 2010.
